title: Dendrite inhibiting electrolytes for metal-based batteries

classifications.description: Liquid materials characterised by the additives
Accumulators with insertion or intercalation of metals other than lithium, e.g. with magnesium or aluminium
Liquid materials characterised by the solutes
Liquid materials characterised by the solvents
Selection of substances as active materials, active masses, active liquids of elements or alloys
Alkaline or alkaline earth metals elements
Composite material consisting of a mixture of organic and inorganic materials
Separators, membranes or diaphragms characterised by the material having a layered structure comprising layers of only organic material and layers containing inorganic material
Separators, membranes or diaphragms characterised by the material having a layered structure comprising three or more layers
Energy storage systems for electromobility, e.g. batteries

abstract: The present invention discloses a metal-based battery comprising at least one metal electrode immersed in an electrolyte comprising: (1) an aprotic solvent; (2) a halogen-containing simple substance; and optionally ( 3) Metal salts with halogen-containing complex anions. The halogen-containing simple species may include metal halide salts comprising metal cations selected from, but not limited to, lithium and sodium metal cations. The metal halide salt may also include a halide anion selected from the group consisting of fluoride, chloride, bromide and iodide halide anions. The use of the metal halide salt in the metal-based battery provides enhanced cycling capability in the metal-based battery. Additional halogen-containing simple substance additives that could enhance the cycle performance of metal-based batteries are also contemplated.
abstract_original: 本发明公开了一种金属基蓄电池，所述金属基蓄电池包括浸入电解质内的至少一个金属电极，所述电解质包括：(1)非质子溶剂；(2)含卤素简单物质；以及任选的(3)具有含卤素复杂阴离子的金属盐。所述含卤素简单物质可包括金属卤化物盐，所述金属卤化物盐包括金属阳离子，所述金属阳离子选自但不限于锂和钠金属阳离子。所述金属卤化物盐还可包括卤化物阴离子，所述卤化物阴离子选自氟化物、氯化物、溴化物和碘化物卤化物阴离子。所述金属卤化物盐在所述金属基蓄电池内的使用提供了所述金属基蓄电池内增强的循环能力。还设想了可增强金属基蓄电池循环性能的额外含卤素简单物质添加剂。
claims:
1.一种可充电蓄电池，包括：1. A rechargeable storage battery, comprising:
      
      
         至少一个金属电极；和at least one metal electrode; and
      
      
         电解质，所述电解质包含：an electrolyte comprising:
      
      
         非质子溶剂；和aprotic solvents; and
      
      
         含卤素简单物质。Halogenated simple substances.
2.根据权利要求1所述的可充电蓄电池，其中所述电解质还包含具有含卤素复杂阴离子的金属盐。2. The rechargeable battery of claim 1, wherein the electrolyte further comprises a metal salt having a halogen-containing complex anion.

3.根据权利要求1所述的可充电蓄电池，其中所述非质子溶剂选自碳酸亚乙酯、碳酸亚丙酯、碳酸二乙酯和碳酸二甲酯。3. The rechargeable battery of claim 1, wherein the aprotic solvent is selected from the group consisting of ethylene carbonate, propylene carbonate, diethyl carbonate, and dimethyl carbonate.

4.根据权利要求1所述的可充电蓄电池，其中所述含卤素简单物质包含金属卤化物盐，所述金属卤化物盐包括：4. The rechargeable battery of claim 1, wherein said halogen-containing simple substance comprises a metal halide salt comprising:
      
      
         选自锂和钠的金属阳离子；以及metal cations selected from lithium and sodium; and
      
      
         选自氟化物、氯化物、溴化物和碘化物的卤化物阴离子。A halide anion selected from fluoride, chloride, bromide and iodide.
5.根据权利要求4所述的可充电蓄电池，其中所选择的所述金属阳离子与所述至少一个金属电极中所用的金属相同。5. The rechargeable battery of claim 4, wherein said metal cation is selected to be the same metal used in said at least one metal electrode.

6.根据权利要求1所述的可充电蓄电池，其中：6. The rechargeable battery of claim 1, wherein:
      
      
         所述含卤素简单物质以所述非质子溶剂的约5摩尔％至约40摩尔％的浓度存在；并且said halogen-containing simple species is present at a concentration of about 5 mole percent to about 40 mole percent of said aprotic solvent; and
      
      
         具有所述含卤素复杂阴离子的所述金属盐以相对于所述非质子溶剂约0.5M至约2M的浓度存在。The metal salt with the halogen-containing complex anion is present at a concentration of about 0.5M to about 2M relative to the aprotic solvent.

7.根据权利要求4所述的可充电蓄电池，其中所述电解质基本上由所述非质子溶剂、所述含卤素简单物质以及具有所述含卤素复杂阴离子的所述金属盐组成。7. The rechargeable battery of claim 4, wherein said electrolyte consists essentially of said aprotic solvent, said halogen-containing simple species, and said metal salt with said halogen-containing complex anion.
8.根据权利要求1所述的可充电蓄电池，还包括将所述至少一个金属电极与额外的反电极隔开的隔板。8. The rechargeable battery of claim 1, further comprising a separator separating the at least one metal electrode from an additional counter electrode.

9.根据权利要求8所述的可充电蓄电池，其中所述隔板包括多孔陶瓷芯，所述多孔陶瓷芯分隔并层合到一对可渗透的聚合物材料层。9. The rechargeable battery of claim 8, wherein the separator comprises a porous ceramic core separated and laminated to a pair of permeable layers of polymeric material.

10.根据权利要求9所述的可充电蓄电池，其中所述一对可渗透的聚合物材料层包括多孔电绝缘聚合物材料。10. The rechargeable battery of claim 9, wherein the pair of permeable layers of polymeric material comprises a porous electrically insulating polymeric material.
11.根据权利要求10所述的可充电蓄电池，其中所述隔板用所述电解质饱和。11. The rechargeable battery of claim 10, wherein the separator is saturated with the electrolyte.

12.一种组合物，包含：12. A composition comprising:
      
      
         非质子溶剂；Aprotic solvents;
      
      
         含卤素简单物质；以及Halogen-containing simple substances; and
      
      
         具有含卤素复杂阴离子的金属盐。Metal salts with halogen-containing complex anions.
13.根据权利要求12所述的组合物，其中所述组合物包含金属基蓄电池电解质。13. The composition of claim 12, wherein the composition comprises a metal-based battery electrolyte.

14.根据权利要求12所述的组合物，其中所述非质子溶剂选自碳酸亚乙酯、碳酸亚丙酯、碳酸二乙酯和碳酸二甲酯。14. The composition of claim 12, wherein the aprotic solvent is selected from the group consisting of ethylene carbonate, propylene carbonate, diethyl carbonate and dimethyl carbonate.

15.根据权利要求12所述的组合物，其中所述含卤素简单物质选自金属卤化物盐、单质双原子卤素、非金属卤化物、卤化氢、混合卤素卤化物以及惰性气体卤化物。15. The composition of claim 12, wherein the halogen-containing simple species is selected from the group consisting of metal halide salts, elemental diatomic halogens, non-metal halides, hydrogen halides, mixed halogen halides, and noble gas halides.

16.根据权利要求12所述的组合物，其中具有所述含卤素复杂阴离子的所述金属盐选自金属TFSI盐、金属四氟硼酸盐和金属六氟磷酸盐。16. The composition of claim 12, wherein said metal salt having said halogen-containing complex anion is selected from the group consisting of metal TFSI salts, metal tetrafluoroborates, and metal hexafluorophosphates.
17.根据权利要求12所述的组合物，其中所述含卤素简单物质基本上不溶于所述非质子溶剂内。17. The composition of claim 12, wherein the halogen-containing simple species is substantially insoluble in the aprotic solvent.
18.根据权利要求12所述的组合物，其中所述含卤素简单物质可部分溶于所述非质子溶剂内。18. The composition of claim 12, wherein the halogen-containing simple species is partially soluble in the aprotic solvent.
19.根据权利要求12所述的组合物，其中所述含卤素简单物质基本上可溶于所述非质子溶剂内。19. The composition of claim 12, wherein the halogen-containing simple species is substantially soluble in the aprotic solvent.

20.根据权利要求12所述的组合物，其中所述含卤素简单物质以所述非质子溶剂的约5摩尔％至约40摩尔％的量存在。20. The composition of claim 12, wherein the halogen-containing simple species is present in an amount of about 5 mole percent to about 40 mole percent of the aprotic solvent.

21.根据权利要求12所述的组合物，其中具有所述含卤素复杂阴离子的所述金属盐以相对于所述非质子溶剂约0.5M至约2M的浓度存在。21. The composition of claim 12, wherein said metal salt with said halogen-containing complex anion is present at a concentration of about 0.5M to about 2M relative to said aprotic solvent.

22.一种用于操作二次蓄电池的方法，包括：22. A method for operating a secondary battery comprising:
      
      
         对二次蓄电池进行放电，以提供放电后的二次蓄电池，所述二次蓄电池包括：Discharging the secondary battery to provide a discharged secondary battery including:
      
      
         至少一个金属电极；和at least one metal electrode; and
      
      
         电解质，所述电解质包含：an electrolyte comprising:
      
      
         非质子溶剂；和aprotic solvents; and
      
      
         含卤素简单物质；以及Halogen-containing simple substances; and
      
      
         对所述放电后的二次蓄电池进行再充电，以提供再充电的二次蓄电池，所述再充电的二次蓄电池在所述至少一个金属电极处无枝晶形成。The discharged secondary battery is recharged to provide a recharged secondary battery free of dendrite formation at the at least one metal electrode.

23.根据权利要求22所述的方法，其中在至少约1000个放电和充电循环后，所述再充电的二次蓄电池在所述至少一个金属电极处无枝晶形成。23. The method of claim 22, wherein the recharged secondary battery is free of dendrite formation at the at least one metal electrode after at least about 1000 discharge and charge cycles.

24.根据权利要求22所述的方法，其中在放电和充电至少约1000个小时后，所述再充电的二次蓄电池在所述至少一个金属电极处无枝晶形成。24. The method of claim 22, wherein the recharged secondary battery is free of dendrite formation at the at least one metal electrode after discharging and charging for at least about 1000 hours.

25.根据权利要求22所述的方法，其中所述非质子溶剂选自碳酸亚乙酯、碳酸亚丙酯、碳酸二乙酯和碳酸二甲酯。25. The method of claim 22, wherein the aprotic solvent is selected from the group consisting of ethylene carbonate, propylene carbonate, diethyl carbonate and dimethyl carbonate.

26.根据权利要求22所述的方法，其中所述含卤素简单物质包含金属卤化物盐，所述金属卤化物盐包括：26. The method of claim 22, wherein the halogen-containing simple species comprises a metal halide salt comprising:
      
      
         选自锂金属和钠金属的金属阳离子；以及metal cations selected from lithium metal and sodium metal; and
      
      
         选自氟化物、氯化物、溴化物和碘化物的卤化物阴离子。A halide anion selected from fluoride, chloride, bromide and iodide.

27.根据权利要求22所述的方法，其中所述含卤素简单物质以所述溶剂的约5摩尔％至约40摩尔％的浓度存在。27. The method of claim 22, wherein the halogen-containing simple species is present at a concentration of about 5 mole percent to about 40 mole percent of the solvent.
28.根据权利要求26所述的方法，其中所选择的所述金属阳离子与所述至少一个金属电极中所用的金属相同。28. The method of claim 26, wherein the selected metal cation is the same metal used in the at least one metal electrode.
29.根据权利要求22所述的方法，其中所述电解质基本上由所述溶剂和所述含卤素简单物质组成。29. The method of claim 22, wherein the electrolyte consists essentially of the solvent and the halogen-containing simple species.

30.根据权利要求22所述的方法，另外其中所述再充电的二次蓄电池包括将所述至少一个金属电极与额外的反电极隔开的隔板，其中：30. The method of claim 22, further wherein said recharged secondary battery includes a separator separating said at least one metal electrode from an additional counter electrode, wherein:
      
      
         所述隔板包括多孔陶瓷芯部件，所述多孔陶瓷芯部件分隔并层合到一对可渗透的电绝缘聚合物材料层；并且the separator comprises a porous ceramic core member separated and laminated to a pair of permeable layers of electrically insulating polymeric material; and
      
      
         所述隔板用所述电解质饱和。The separator is saturated with the electrolyte.
